entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build --framework builds referenced project twice #26690
  • sdk style project with .net framework 3.5 got incorrect result in VS2022 17.2.6(mscorlib.dll and nlp files copied) #26685

Closed

  • Make it possible to use newer ILCompiler packages than what SDK comes with #26268
    7.0.1xx
  • VisualStudioWorkloads is not source-build compatible #25616
  • Feature Request: Ability to import implicit usings from a ProjectReference #26679
    Discussion
  • What is the usage of MS.NETCore.App.Host 3.1 and 6.0 in SDK and can it be removed for source-build? #26482
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't set ObjCopyName in testing #26687

Merged

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility
  • BinaryFormatter obsolete as error in net7 #26559
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1891103 #26571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
